name: The Villas Bali Hotel & Spa

reviews.text: We have just returned from our third stay at The Villas Bali. The first time at The Sunset Villas and the second time at the original villas. Even though they are older I much prefer the original villas, the location is perfect. Opposite the Bali Deli and much easier to get a taxi. My husband and I went with another couple and rented Villa No 3 which is a three bedroom, three bathroom villa (hubby snores). I love these villas so much but just two little things I didn't like. The baths in the ensuites are quite dangerous to get in and out of. Very easy to slip if you aren't careful.
reviews.title: Third stay at these beautiful villas

reviews.text: Even though there were four of us and we had rented a three bedroom villa it took us three days to get an extra two pool lounges delivered. Two lounges in a three bedroom villa seems silly. Any way they eventually arrived and a we enjoyed our time ar The Villas Bali.
reviews.title: Absolutly Amazing!!

reviews.text: All I can say is this place is fantastic!! We travelled throughout Bali for a month and this place was the best!
reviews.title: A glimpse of paradise

reviews.text: Me and my girlfriend stayed at the Villas for 10 days. Originally we had it booked for 7 days, but after arriving in our own villa, we knew we had to stay longer, so we extended. That was the best decision we've made all year. 7 days is not enough to enjoy everything The Villas and Seminyak have to offer. Everything was just perfect from the moment we got off the plane, to the moment of leaving the country. I felt like a princess during our stay. It's hard to say which was the best part about the holiday. I loved having freshly cooked breakfast (cooked in our own kitchen) in the morning, just as much as having breakfast in the beautiful Prana Restaurant, overlooking the Prana courtyard, with its beautiful decor and colours. Having our own private pool was just fantastic, as it meant I could get up in the morning and jump right in, without having to worry about swimwear or googling eyes from other guests. We did a few trips to animal parks, which the hotel organised for us. It was truely a holiday in paradise, with not a single thing to worry about. The staff are very happy and treat you with respect and look after you.
reviews.title: Absolute Bliss

reviews.text: Normally I'm not very adventurous with food and I generally order what I know I will like, to avoid disappointment. At The Villas, I ordered something different every day from room service and I loved it all.
reviews.title: A great place to retreat to from the hustle and bustle of Bali

reviews.text: We just stayed there for one night but everything was perfect!!!!
reviews.title: Perfect stay

reviews.text: Small thing like, the rubish bin in the Kitchen / outdoors are was broken so each time you wanted to use it you had to use both hands just to throw away some rubbish and it was not That clean..
reviews.title: The small think make a difference

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Before 10am you will have every one in the hotels staff ring your door bell, the guys to cook your breakfast ( they are always welcome) But then the pool guy enters, the housekeeping staff, the guy who checks the mini bar, then the gardner..This happens every day and after the second day I made sure I was out all morning.
reviews.title: Fabulous!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Oh and there is only enough parking for maybe 2 guests cars.
reviews.title: Honeymoon Bliss

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My stay was enjoyable but if only the Indonesian staff got a handle on the correct way to run a hotel!
reviews.title: Absolutely out of this world

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Welcome was lovely and the whole place idyllic. Staff were more than attentive to our needs without being intrusive. The private swimming pool in a one bedroom villa was massive. The beds are great and feel-good pillows. Breakfasts were amazing and restaurant very good, however on our last night, the restaurant was very busy so the service was a little slow. There are two Spas, Prana or Chill…treatments were excellent and very professional. They gave us two free massages, but only 40 minutes. Grounds were beautiful and well kept. Location is good for shopping and many great restaurants, but the walk to the beach is about 15 minutes. We actually liked it so much that we ended staying an extra couple of nights.
reviews.title: Made my trip to Bali fabulous..

reviews.text: We stayed at the villas with 3 young chidren who made the most of the private pool. Our stay was fantastic and enjoyed by my whole family. The staff at the Villa's were always ready to answer our questions and assist when required. They provided well balanced security, privacy and assistance.
reviews.title: Fantastic, private accomodation central to all your needs.

reviews.text: I would reccomend this accomodation to anyone looking for a relaxing holiday away from the hussle and bussle of Kuta. Pool fence would be required if your children cannot swim. Sure to return!!!!! Thanks.
reviews.title: Expensive but worth every penny!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Villas Bali is always an amazing experience. Nothing it too much trouble for the staff and the level of service is nothing short of superb. The locations is great, opposite Bali Deli for snacks and light meals, and a short taxi ride from great bars and restaurants. Loved having breakfast made in the villa, loved having our own pool, loved every minute of it!
reviews.title: Bali honeymoon at The Villas

reviews.text: My wife booked 3 nights at the Villas in part of a combo deal with another villa in Ubud and i deliberately didn't look much at the web site as i wanted it to be a surprise. Well, when we first entered the outside door into the garden i was completely blown away by the large private pool, beautiful garden, open air kitchen where breakfast is cooked for you each morning as you want it and at the exact time you request it, large bedroom and gorgeous bathroom (btw, definitely go for the rose pettle bath). All in all we found the Villas to be faultless and if you want completely privacy and an amazing place to stay then this is perfect for you. Furthermore the service and friendly staff were excellent and would like to say a big thanks to them for making this a beautiful start to our honeymoon.
reviews.title: too expensive now without the service

reviews.text: WOW ! This place is absolutley great, we stayed in a 2 bed villa, in the Sunset section, it was spotlessley clean, the gardens and pool were lovely. It was really great to go out and do all the Bali stuff and come back to this little tranquil garden where nobody disturbed you and you didnt have to share the pool with a thousand other people. I had read an earlier review about the drive up to the hotel being a bit worrying - which was lucky - thanks to that reviewer :-) but they were right dont panic you turn the corner into the villas and its peacfull and very quiet. The staff are wonderfull and very helpfull. I will certainly be going back there ASAP !!!
reviews.title: Absolutley Beautifull

reviews.text: The pool was the best I have ever had for a 1 bed villa, a swimming pool as opposed to plunge pool: 10 metres or so, nice and wide, nice and deep. The garden as absolutely private and even though I think there was some maintenance being done nearby, I felt very relaxed and peaceful here.
reviews.title: Fabulous - peaceful, private, great spa

reviews.text: The villa is upside down and inside out- the kitchen outside, living room upstairs, bedroom downstairs & indoors and the outdoor bathroom behind. But the layout works really well for Bali. The villas are not brand new, but mine was in good condition, and perfectly clean and tidy. Definitely take some CDs (there is no iPod plug), enjoy a cold drink and relax!
reviews.title: could not fault

reviews.text: Just right!! Loved this place....finally found the place that will work just right for all my family....for me it is still the essence of bali with its beautiful thatched dome and the perfume of the flowering garden set around a wonderful private pool and the funky bali aesthetic plus private luxury...... outside living with the of temperature controlled bedroom retreat and a beautiful bathroom which feels part of the garden .....
reviews.title: Goldilocks hits the jackpot at the villas

reviews.text: My girls will go mad about the shopping and the restaurants and the yoga centre there ...the Bali Deli in front of us was just brilliant late at night when the munchies kicked in...but the real winner for me and my friend was Chill the little inexpensive reflexology massage centre down our lane...nearly everyday..brilliant good strong hands
reviews.title: Beware!

reviews.text: We had three really big bedroom suites ..really fun staff ...goldilocks is bringing the family
reviews.title: Beautiful, spacious, private, romantic, excellent location, fantastic staff.

reviews.text: This is long overdue but my experience at this hotel still bothers me and i think people deserve to know what they may be in for.
reviews.title: The best Bali experience in 38 years of going there.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We arrived at the hotel just after check in time at which point we were told that there was a leak in the roof of our villa and that it would not be available until 6pm. We were taken to a temporary villa which although looked beautiful smelt extremely damp. We were given welcome drinks that tasted something like dishwashing detergent.
reviews.title: Relaxing Fantastic Holiday - Highly Recommended

reviews.text: These Villas has suffered alot from neglect and minimal maintainence. We had a 3 bedroom we rented with friends. The pool was nice and the service was pretty good / responsive but the villas can only be described as discusting.....unclean, air-con in-effective, fridge not cold, bad water, smells, doors wouldnt shut, room service food un-eatable, bed very uncomfortable....
reviews.title: Disgusting

reviews.text: Villa rental in Bali is now very competitive....dont stay here but do your homework and choose another villa
reviews.title: lovely place to stay

reviews.text: Great staff and service, the villas were luxurious. We left our other accomodation as too far from anything, walked into this place and loved it. Everythin very clean, the private pool was large and cleaned daily. Room maintenance twice a day! A complimetary dvd player, we had a 2 bedroom so we had our own bathroom each. We had the best time
reviews.title: an oasis in the middle of Seminyak

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: stayed here in a two bedroom villa with our two daughters from 10-13th December. The villa we had was perfect. The staff at the villas were all polite and friendly. Everyone wanted to make sure you had a perfect holiday and were so friendly. We tried the prana spa and chill and both were exceptional. Our villa really was gorgeous just like the pictures on their website. We were located in their sunset area and it is in the middle of Seminyak, it is a short stroll to the main road which is full of shops an restaurants and was geat to walk at night and be greeted by so many people just happy to smile and say hello. We had booked a late check out so we packed up and left our bags with reception and then went out to dinner and did some shopping. We arrived back at the villas still too early for our arranged transport to the airport, but the girl at the reception offered us a villa to stay and wait in until our transport arrived. What an outstanding gesture, really appreciated and I got to see a 1 bedroom villa which was gorgeous so i know if I travell without kids next time I will book it as it is beautiful the one we had. This is a great place to stay go ahead and book you wont be dissapointed.
reviews.title: When can I stay again??

reviews.text: My wife and I recently had the pleasure of 15 nights here in a one bedroom villa. Our own pool, bathroom, kitchen, lounge room and dining area made this a perfect escape from the wolrd. The bed was very comfortable, everything was clean and cleaned daily, the sound system was a joy. Everyone from the airport pick-up to the airport drop-off were exceptional, nothing was ever an issue. All the staff were warm and friendly and all made sure we were pampered and relaxed. The Prana Restaurant breakfast was different every day..American, Japanese, Healthy, Indonesian..you could even have it in your villa but we preferred the morning ritual and fun at the restaurant. The Prana Spa is worth travelling the world for, be treated like a king and queen from the days of the Raj..every treatment was superb. Next door they also have Chill, a reflexology massage centre..amazing what their hands did to our bodies.
reviews.title: second visit, perfect again

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This was our second time staying at The Villas Bali. They have two sites and we have now stayed at both. The first ones we stayed at were almost opposite the Bintang Supermarket and whilst newer than the original villas weren't in as a convenient location. The original villas are opposite The Bali Deli which is a great deli to stock up on cold meats etc. We loved everything about The Villas Bali, the privacy of your own villa, a great pool, your own kitchen but the thing that makes them special is the staff. Nothing was too much trouble. We have booked to go again in July.
reviews.title: Second stay and have booked third.

reviews.text: pools and kids dont mix, we were worried about a pool and having 3 kids under 6, the pool fence worked a treat. My wife was concerned about food for our 10 month old but she needent of been as there was a supermarket across the road that had all we needed for our baby and toddlers to eat, the villa also catered well for our older kids, all the staff loved our kids and we felt 100% safe in the villa with little kids. we will never stay anywhere else but the villas bali as we have never been so at ease in bali before.
reviews.title: great with a baby and young family

reviews.text: The villa we had was perfect we shared it with another couple and their 2 year old and we had plenty of room in the 3 bedroom villa.
reviews.title: Privacy plus Paradise with all the perks

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: As a family we have avoided travelling to Bali till now preferring most other parts of Asia especially Vietnam, Malaysia. Our trip to the Villas in January will definitely change our view about Bali, we're keen to come back soon.
reviews.title: Very private and relaxing villas

reviews.text: We stayed in the newer 'Sunset' section of the resort which although away from the spa, is nice and close to the main thoroughfareie supermarket, cafes, warungs, restaurants, boutiques, homewares stores etc from which you can 'retail-therapy' yourself silly in between relaxing - if you are that way inclined.
reviews.title: Perfect

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed at the Villas for 12 day in Jan 2010, whilst we enjoyed our stay I have a couple of comments to make - we stayed in a 1 bedroom Villa in "the Original Villas" area.
reviews.title: Good Location - Private Pool Great

reviews.text: Pros - Great Location especially with the "Bali Deli" just across the road, also close to restaurants. shops ATM's etc, taxi's available at all times.
reviews.title: Very enjoyable stay – hidden gem

reviews.text: Good Security. Security guards always stopped traffic so we could cross the road, Private and quiet.we had a large private pool - perfect for a cool swim after a day out., full size kitchen with large refrigerator, chilled filtered water, basic kitchen equipment and utensils.
reviews.title: Exactly as advertised!

reviews.text: Towels changed twice daily and turn down service at night,
reviews.title: So relaxing I want to go back!!

reviews.text: General staff very friendly - always a hello or a wave and a smile. Staff in reception were ok always polite - but most times did not go out of their way to be helpful.
reviews.title: A very welcoming, relaxing and positive experience.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We had only two issues with this place. #1 the shower would alternate between hot and cold (we didn't care too much, we aren't huge showerers, we could use the bath ok and also used the pool a lot to rinse off the bali sweat). #2 the outdoor sun beds could be better (the mattress not tied to wooden frame, so when you lean back it would slip out. To get around this the chair needs to be in upright position or completely flat).
reviews.title: rEALLY, rEALLY awesome we had the best trip ever

reviews.text: Other than that everything else was awesome. The best service from the staff. Awesome location (right near shops and a 5 minute scooter ride to beach). Breakfast top notch, really great room decoration. Prana spa is awesome! Really good security as well, the guys man the front gate 24x7, no terrorists were going to terrorise us! Bed was a massive king size and really comfortable.
reviews.title: Expected a little more but still nice

reviews.text: We stayed with 7 people (4 adults, 2 young children, 1 baby) in a 3 bedroom villa for 2 weeks. The place is nice and the rooms have a touch of an "authentic" bali theme, even though everything is reasonably modern. First 3 nights we stayed in Villa 1 which was lovely and had a huge pool and garden, and also one pleasant upstairs bedroom, but since it's right next to the street it was so noisy that we really needed to change to a different villa. Luckily one was available, so we went to Villa number 3, this was very quiet. It has two bedrooms adjacent to the main living area, and a third one which is separate and a little smaller, also the bathroom here is quite small. The positives were friendliness of staff (although communication can be a little slow), the two Spas (Prana and esp. Chill), the location is OK but the beach is best reached on a scooter or in a taxi. We did encounter some problems during our stay - the main one was that we had to convince the staff in several stages to do proper cleaning. Also, the pool water was not entirely clean (just OK for swimming) and this did not get fixed during our entire stay, even after several complaints. Internet is working but dropouts requiring re-log on are frequent. We saw rats in our kitchen on two occasions (night time only, and definitively not in the rooms or bathrooms), keeping in mind that these are outdoor kitchens, and the staff sent pest control the next day. Overall a nice stay but more reliable internet, better cleanliness and more straightforward communication could clearly improve the place, and these things should all be expected at this price in any hotel anywhere.
reviews.title: Great place for relaxation and privacy with luxury

reviews.text: Good place for groups that want to be together, great for privacy.
reviews.title: Little Piece of Paradise

reviews.text: Has beautiful grounds and villas that are well maintained.
reviews.title: We stayed in a 3br villa and it was just...

description: Our exclusive accommodations offer privacy and luxury with all the conveniences of a full service hotel. Every one, two or three bedroom Villa has its own private swimming pool. We're located in the heart of Seminyak, one of Bali’s trendiest areas; walking distance to dozens of fabulous restaurants and shops, yet once within The Villas grounds that has 24 hour security, it is extremely quiet and private.
